channel.title: England Cricket on BalleWale Cricket News
channel.description: Recent content in England Cricket on BalleWale Cricket News

item.title: England Survive Nepal Scare to Clinch Last-Over Thriller
item.description: In a nail-biting finish, England edged past Nepal in a last-over thriller at the ICC Cricket World Cup, showcasing resilience and skill.

item.title: England Bat First as Nepal Introduces Sher Malla in International Debut
item.description: England opts to bat first against Nepal, featuring Sher Malla making his international debut in a significant match.

item.title: England Enter the Unknown in Maiden Encounter with Nepal
item.description: England prepares for its first-ever match against Nepal, marking a significant moment in international cricket.
